script:
1). I was wondering, can I get my money back?
No you won't. It's against policy.
Sorry, we only allow exchanges. 
No, you shouldn't. All sales are final.
2). How come I wasn't told about the plan?
Oh. I thought you were. 
I did told you about it.
Wasn't you out of town?
3). Did you get my message?
No, I didn't. 
No, I haven't.
No, I couldn't.
